official_title: To revise the boundary of the Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park in the State of Hawaii.
short_title: Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park Addition Act of 2002

summary.text: Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park Addition Act of 2002 - Modifies the boundaries of Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park in Hawaii to include specified lands.

titles.title: Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park Addition Act of 2002
To revise the boundary of the Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park in the State of Hawaii.
